Source: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs.
Reference: Президент России Владимир Путин подписал закон о введении административной ответственности за нарушение срока и порядка оплаты товаров (работ, услуг) при осуществлении закупок для государственных и муниципальных нужд.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs. The law also establishes a system of accountability for violations in accordance with this procedure.
Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs. The law also establishes a system of accountability for violations in accordance with this procedure.
Премьер-министр России Владимир Путин подписал закон о создании пропорциональной ответственности за нарушение сроков и процедур по оплате товаров, услуг или работ в рамках procurement для нужд государственных и муниципальных организаций. Закон также внесет систему ответственности за нарушения этой процедуры в соответствии с этим планом.

Source: Just two years ago, situations in which business owners were unable to collect payment for already-executed state and municipal contracts were widespread.

Source: Since 2015, 9,700 petitions, in the interests of protecting the rights of business owners to receive payment for public contracts, were filed by the Office of the Prosecutor General: according to the results of their investigations, 4,500 officials were subject to disciplinary measures, and 533 were held administratively liable; 75 cases were submitted to the investigative authorities for procedural review, and criminal proceedings were initiated in 46 of them.
Reference: С 2015 года в интересах защиты прав предпринимателей на получение оплаты по публичным заказам прокуратурой внесено 9,7 тыс. представлений, по результатам их рассмотрения к дисциплинарной ответственности привлечено 4,5 тыс. должностных лиц, к административной - 533, в следственные органы для организации процессуальных проверок представлено 75 материалов, по 46 из них возбуждены уголовные дела.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: Since 2015, 9,700 petitions, in the interests of protecting the rights of business owners to receive payment for public contracts, were filed by the Office of the Prosecutor General: according to the results of their investigations, 4,500 officials were subject to disciplinary measures, and 533 were held administratively liable; 75 cases were submitted to the investigative authorities for procedural review, and criminal proceedings were initiated in 46 of them. In the first quarter of 2018, a total of 2,050 cases involving the protection of the rights of business owners received by the Office of the Prosecutor General were reported.
Translate this into Russian. 2. Избегать работы.
3. Начать с небольшого дохода и строить с ними основу.
4. Сделать выводы о том, что бизнес может потерять свою стоимость.

Source: In the regions where debt indicators continue to climb to critical levels, the prosecutor’s office has adopted a hands-on approach to crisis management.

It is expected that this law will have a positive effect on improving the efficiency of financial management.

The law stipulates that the time limit for payment shall be strictly enforced, and penalties for violations shall also be imposed, including fines or imprisonment for up to three years, if the violation is not detected within two months after discovery.
